summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Community Development Commission (CDC) will hold its monthly meeting on December 7, 2023, at 6:00 PM at City Hall, Conference Room 6ES, with a video conference option available. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss community development initiatives, review budgetary matters, and make decisions regarding the allocation of funds and amendments to the Annual Action Plan.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Approval of the November 2, 2023, meeting minutes  
3. Community Development Division Report, including updates on the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) and the FY2023-24 Annual Action Plan  
4. Discussion and approval of Substantial Amendment No.1 to the FY 2023-24 Annual Action Plan regarding the HOME ARPA Grant Reallocation  

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will feature a report on timely fund expenditures related to the CDBG and updates on proposed committee meetings. A significant proposal includes the reallocation of HOME ARPA Grant funds, which will be discussed in detail and requires approval.

**Action Items**:  
The commission is seeking approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and the proposed Substantial Amendment No.1 to the FY 2023-24 Annual Action Plan. Additionally, public speakers will be given the opportunity to contribute to discussions. 

The meeting will also include announcements and a report from the Chair and Vice Chair, as well as an executive session if necessary for legal or personnel matters.
